newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin down one cent to 14.96 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin down one cent to 14.96 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price ended a cent lower at 14.96 ringgit ($5.94) a kg despite an overnight surge on the London Metal Exchange (LME), traders said.

"There were more sellers than buyers and that was surprising because the LME went up by $70 on Thursday," said a Malaysia-based trader. "The price could move up sharply on Monday if the LME maintains its steam."

Bids were noted for 103 tonnes against offers of 127, leading to a turnover of 116 tonnes from 105 previously. Buyers were Europeans and locals. Discount against the LME rose to $65 from $15. - Barani Krishnaan (603-2307509) ($1=2.5240 ringgit)
